title: Vanuatu: Iririki Island Resort & Spa
inclusions_evidence:
- Accommodation and bonus offers as outlined
- Full breakfast daily
- Welcome drink on arrival
- Complimentary (unlimited) hotel sea transfers
- FREE Wi-Fi
- Use of kayaks & snorkel equipment
- Use of tennis courts & gym
- FREE Kids Club is available for children 3-12 years old
- Return airport transfers
- AU$250 Food & Beverage credit
- Choice of 1 of the below tours per person per stay - Snorkel Tour - Sunset Tour

other.notes: DIY costs for food and activities are estimated based on average prices.

reasoning: The deal offers significant inclusions such as meals, activities, and transfers, making it a good value compared to DIY options.
